message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase my product for $11,500. I believe it would be of great value to you.
I'm interested in purchasing the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your offer, the product's value is considerably higher. I could meet you halfway at $10,750.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I really like the product, but I have a limited budget. Can we meet at $10,250?
